channel.title: Mobile on Hello World
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile on Hello World

item.title: Build mobile app with web dev skills
item.description: What is mobile app A mobile application, basically, is a computer generated program designed and developed to run on iPhone, Android Smartphone, and many other mobile devices. In a nutshell, there are three types of apps Native apps are specific to a given mobile platform (iOS or Android) using the development tools and language that the respective platform. Usaully it looks and performs the best. HTML5 apps use standard web technologiesâ€”typically HTML5, JavaScript and CSS.
